# Test that orphaned files are deleted when template files are renamed

# First generate with old template file name
muxt generate --output-multiple-files

exists old_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go

# Rename template file and regenerate
mv old.gohtml new.gohtml

muxt generate --output-multiple-files

# Old file should be deleted, new file should exist
! exists old_template_routes_gen.go
exists new_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go

exec go test

-- main_test.go --
package main

import (
	"net/http"
	"net/http/httptest"
	"testing"
)

func TestRoutes(t *testing.T) {
	mux := http.NewServeMux()
	s := new(Server)
	TemplateRoutes(mux, s)

	rec := httptest.NewRecorder()
	req := httptest.NewRequest("GET", "/", nil)
	mux.ServeHTTP(rec, req)

	if rec.Code != http.StatusOK {
		t.Errorf("expected 200, got %d", rec.Code)
	}
}
